segments.text: That overflowing sink is disgusting— water just pouring out everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor looks filthy, spreading across the tiles.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot is in it, and she doesn't even flinch— gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's wiping that plate like the mess isn't happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids with their sticky cookie raid on that dirty stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Hands in the jar, crumbs probably falling into the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaching up, begging for her share— it's all so messy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water streaming down the cabinet doors, ruining the finish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked nearby, at risk of getting splashed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window's garden is clean, but inside it's a sopping disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand how unaware they all are of this nasty situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The towel she's using might end up soaked in that puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene makes my stomach turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool tilting with the boy on it— even more potential grime.
segments.speaker: PAR
